notes.text:
saw @midfree tech in Regulation of Tribe, so i put one in for gigs and ended up going all the way. lots of one-dimensional decks rn so it works well to stall for a turn or more. one game, i was able to  tribute two of my floodgated monsters and a summoned canadia to keep it active for 3+ turns

1 ghostrick scare for gigs, and it came in clutch against the one mirror i faced, and sylvans if i went second

SRH for if i drew no ties and it hits the fan.
